title: /lit/ guide to right-wing literature (assembled by /pol/) azw3
description:
Image of directory: http://image.bayimg.com/f84a6d908ffb6c205f6a04c084196516a8a9c2aa.jpg

Image of collection: http://image.bayimg.com/85fb7f050af187b6f782f87783f8c2f798909c9b.jpg

All files contained in this torrent are in azw3, either originally in azw3, or converted from epub/mobi/etc. The following books could not be found: 
The Unfortunates - William Baer
The Outlaws - Ernst Von Salomon
Origins and Doctrine of Fascism - Giovanni Gentile
The Institutes of Biblical Law - Roushas Rushdoony
The Counter-revolution - Thomas Molnar

In addition, the following could only be found in pdf, thus were included anyway:
The Alternative - Oswald Mosley
The Glass Bees - Ernst Junger & Bruce Sterling
Popular Government - Sir Henry Sumner Maine
The Reign of Quantity & the Signs of the Times - Rene Guenon
The Revolt of the Masses - Jose Ortega Y Gasset
Ride the Tiger - Julius Evola
Tarr - Percy
Christianity and Culture - T. S. Eliot

If you can find an ebook of any of these in any format, I would greatly appreciate you getting it to me via a comment to this torrent.
